intro: Navarretia ojaiensis, commonly known as Ojai navarretia, is a flowering plant native to California, specifically the Ojai Valley. It is a member of the flowering plant family Montiaceae and is characterized by its small, white flowers that bloom in the spring. The plant typically grows in rocky or gravelly soils and is often found in open, sunny habitats. Navarretia ojaiensis is known for its delicate appearance and is considered a rare and endemic species within its native range.
